messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON
messages.content: WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN TODAY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Under Labour 2 million young people have left school without a single GCSE. I want to make sure that our children have the best start in life.
Alan will work to keep council tax rates low and improve value for money of public spending.
Alan will work to improve bus routes, rail links and the paths and roads of our city making it faster and easier for people to get in and out of the city.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for front line services in Leeds
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Alan has campaigned with politicians from all parties to try and make the local NHS deliver the dialysis unit at the LGI as it has repeatedly promised.

leaflet.personalStatement: Why should I bother to vote? It won't make a difference! I want to be a local MP you can feel proud of, who fights to make your community a better place to live. Your vote could really make a difference, everyone who didn't vote here last time votes for me, I could win.

contactInformation.address: Leeds Conservative Campaign Centre, 389 Harrogate Road, Leeds, LS17 6PY

leaflet.additionalNotes: Alan grew up in Leeds and worked in the city centre for many years. Alan runs a successful pub business meeting all sorts of people every day. Alan has been a Leeds City Councillor since 2007. He is a talented singer/songwriter who has played in several rock bands.
